pthread_once_t Struct Reference
[Pthread]

A structure describing a control block used with the pthread_once() function. More...

Data Fields

  • AtomicWord done
  • pthread_mutex_t lock

Detailed Description

A structure describing a control block used with the pthread_once() function.

It should be considered an opaque record; the names of the fields can change anytime.

Field Documentation

AtomicWord pthread_once_t::done

A flag: 1 if the function was already called, 0 if it wasn't.

pthread_mutex_t pthread_once_t::lock

Synchronization lock for the flag.
